titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The Detroit Sunday journal.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.altformavail: Also "appears daily on the World Wide Web at http://www.rust.net/%7Eworkers/strike.html" under the title: Detroit journal.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Sunday Journal, Inc., c1995-

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "A publication by striking Detroit newspaper workers."

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "Published ... for the duration of the current labor dispute at the Detroit Free Press, Detroit News and Detroit Newspapers, Inc. The Journal will cease publication when members of the six striking unions reach contract agreements with the companies."
